alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 01 at 4:47AM PDT until September 01 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following areas, Cadiz Basin and Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve
